name: Prototype Zombies Top Down War
description:
Switch between weapon use number from 1 to 5 ;

1 bat

2 gun

3 riffle

4 fire

5 knife

Game Summary: Headquarter sent a soldier to take down zombies, the soldier will be sent to a different place.

Objects like cars and gas can be destroyed.

The player can choose a character at the beginning of the game.

Free game with ads video: More Money to buy from the store in-game.

The Character has a different look and speed and health  and power,
